name: havana
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of Cuba, in the western part of the country: This impressive baroque building is one of the most beautiful in Havana and dominates the Plaza de Armas. Havana owes much of its growth and prosperity to its natural harbour, an ideal stopping-off point for ships on the northern coast of Cuba.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Havana the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Havana.His novels are filled with powerful descriptions of Havana.
